name: Chicken Hunter (itch) (Enessur)
description:
Chicken hunter oyununda 'W A S D' tuşları ile hareket edip 'Space' tuşu ile seedleri bırakıyorsunuz. Amacınız bütün tavukları ormana çekmek.

 In this game you move with 'W A S D' and drop seed with 'Space Bar'. Your goal is to lure all the chickens in to the forest. 

Bu oyun Mağara Jam #5 için 72 saat içerisinde yapılmıştır.

Enessur + LordPenguen 

Assets: 

https://shubibubi.itch.io/cozy-farm 

https://broke-one-pixel-studio.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-character-sprite-with-28-animations

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/sunny-land-103349 

SFX & Music: 

https://freesfx.co.uk/Category/Birds/21 (Chicken Clucking and Moving) 

https://freesfx.co.uk/Category/Country/211 (Barn Raising) 

https://freesfx.co.uk/Category/Dogs/14 (Animal Dogs Large Breed) 

https://freesfx.co.uk/Category/Pop-Bang/253 (Small Pop)
